SourceString: Purchase an additional caravan tab to expand your stash for {GoldAmount} Gold?
You\'ve reached the\r\nmaximum amount of tabs.
Spend <b_gold>{EmbersAmount}</> more in the current Tier to unlock the next.

DevComment: This text is in a screen to seperate relics and charms from the item they were socketed into

SourceString: Separating your Relic or Charm from an item returns both the item and the Relic or Charm to your inventory intact.
